thumb.title: My Father's Eyes MTV Unplugged (Eric Clapton Live Guitar Cover) with Martin 00-45
thumb.description: This is a live guitar cover of Layla performed for the MTV Unplugged on the 16th of January, 1992. Leave a comment below to suggest any live recordings you want me to cover in the future! The original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8MOAN5mO-6o Buy me a coffee: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/takahonda Equipment: Mics: Lewitt LCT140, Se Electronic VR2 Mic Preamp: ART Pro MPA II Compressor: Behringer 369 #mtv #ericclapton #unplugged
